about.title: About Deskundigewijzer
about.intro: Deskundigewijzer is the new platform for finding judicial experts in the Netherlands. We make it easy to find the right expertise for legal matters.

mission.title: Our mission
mission.content: We believe that access to the right expert knowledge is essential for a fair legal process. Deskundigewijzer brings legal professionals and qualified experts together on one comprehensive platform. By focusing on transparency, quality, and ease of use, we make expert knowledge accessible to everyone who needs it.

services.title: What we offer
services.item1: An extensive database of judicial experts from various fields
services.item2: Detailed profiles with specializations, experience, and contact information
services.item3: Advanced search functions to quickly find the right expert

contact.title: Contact
contact.content: Do you have questions about Deskundigewijzer or would you like more information about how we can help you? We're here for you.
